column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place was SO good! It is a tad bit on the pricy side
column2: but I think it was well worth it. It was my first time here so we asked our server for recommendations. Parker was super polite and attentive
column3: and made fantastic recommendations! We had the hush puppies
column5: and the salmon. The short ribs were so tender!
